Tip #1: Input your text via voice too!Tip #2: For fast access, keep it in the notification bar, always one click awayTip #3: For even faster access, long-press the search button to open the spell checker right awayOnce you become an addict to this corrector, check out the PRO version! reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I normally don\'t give too many reviews but this one deserves 5 stars it is truly a good app! You can paste entire corrected paragraphs to email, text, and to your notepad that\'s just what I\'ve tried so far this app is awesome.
reviews.author: Joe Lorenzo

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: I love how I can just speak directly into the phone instead of typing the word or sentence. I also can type or speak something into the app and instead of copying it, then pasting elsewhere, I can just click \"Send\" and directly send it through text, Facebook, email, Twitter, etc. It\'s very convenient and simple to use.
reviews.author: Kimberly Wong

reviews.title: Not what I needed
reviews.comment: I was hoping for an automatic spell check, like on computer. Whenever I type something, no matter the keyboard or app, it will let me know when a word looks wrong.
reviews.author: Zj Fox

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: Perfect for people like myself that cannot spell what so ever!! Especially for the times I cant get the auto predict to find the word! You can \"speak\" to find the spelling which is AMAZING!! THANKS for the GREAT APP EXACTLY WHAT I NEEDED!!;-)
reviews.author: tiffany whitsett

reviews.title: Not bad!
reviews.comment: My only real complaint/ suggestion is to have the spell check button be part of the main button row. The ads already take up part of the screen, and with a slide out keyboard the spell check button falls off the top. There is no reason for it to be seperate from the other buttons; just shorten the language select button!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t see what I\'m typing !
reviews.comment: This app looks like just what I need but I can\'t see what I\'m typing because the text field is covered by a blank box that says \'click the ad below to hide them for today\' the problem is i can\'t click on the ad because i use an ad blocker so there is no way for me to beable to remove the blank box and view what I\'m typing as i type which makes the app next to useless because that\'s the main use for it typing and and checking my typing so why put the ad over the typing box ! that\'s just plain stupid , so i won\'t be bothering to buy the paid version ( that\'s usually what i do , try out the free version and if i like i buy it) now i need to try and find something like this app but that i can actually see what I\'m typing, after all for a spell checking app that\'s not much to ask for is it. edit > only just installed it today and it\'s claiming it\'s only a trail version , what\'s going! on I\'ve just rechecked the app on google play ( this page ) and it doesn\'t say anything about it only being a trial does it or am i blind.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Rubbish!
reviews.comment: You are forced to watch stupid ads and you have to click on them one a day! But you also have a180 limit of 180 symbols! Uninstall!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic!!!
reviews.comment: Why i ever remove ths app idk.    Its 1 of my most used and needed. Its great
reviews.author: stacey Smith

reviews.title: 180 limit is BS
reviews.comment: It was fine before this stupid 180 limit on words for free version.....I had to reset my phone and download it again and I got this limit on words version now,,went from the best spellcheck to now ill look for another
reviews.author: kimari Kim Ar

reviews.title: Spelling now not right
reviews.comment: What\'s up with the spell checker now it doesn\'t spell numbers anymore why I don\'t know it just comes up with the number instead of spelling it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not the perfect solution but...
reviews.comment: The best I could have hoped for withhout it being part of the android software instead of an app.  Thank you so much!  I can fb and text with confidence again :)  Get with the program android.  I\'m headed over to buy the pro version but would be soooo happy if ya\'ll made this app obsolete!
reviews.author: Kris Zito

reviews.title: My favorite school related app
reviews.comment: If you are a terrible speller or you just need to know how to spell a word this is the app for you. My two favorite parts about the app are the voice imput option. Just say the word and it will spell it. Second is  the notification center open. Open the app from the notification center.
reviews.author: Austin Fratto

reviews.title: Can\'t see what I write
reviews.comment: Poor spell check + you can\'t see what you write and every time you something to write you have to open this app

reviews.title: i...
reviews.comment: A spell check that doesn\'t capitalize \"I \" that\'s just not cool.
reviews.author: Vinny Cross

reviews.title: Not working
reviews.comment: I use samsung note bk 1.It didnt work after installing it. Waste of time.
reviews.author: Kenny Amoah

reviews.title: Awesome application
reviews.comment: I never want to spelling bee. Now I can
reviews.author: Richard Stifflemire

reviews.comment: Spell checker app is the best!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No good for me
reviews.comment: Too slow to load
reviews.author: Pablo Pizzini

reviews.title: John Alfred
reviews.comment: I would give it 4 stars if it were like a computer automatic spell checker
reviews.author: John Winston

reviews.comment: So not that good its difficult to deleat the word after you spell checjed it but lets give it a bit of time it could get better it myt just be me
